topic.title: Little Red Riding Hood
topic.shortdesc: Little Red Riding. hood finds out that it is not her Grandmother but it is the wolf.

fig.title: Grandmother Coming Out Of The Closet

body.p: Little Red Riding Hood confronts the wolf. "What do you think you are doing in my Grandmothers bed? Where is my Grandmother?"
Mr. Wolf replies. " I pranked you, your Grandmother is in the closet over there." He laughs at the girl because of the prank he pulled.
Little Red Riding Hood does not find it funny. "Now that you have had your fun, please leave so I can take care of my grandmother."
"Of course, I will be off Little Red Riding Hood" Mr. Wolf leaves.
Little Red Riding Hood gets her Grandmother and they have a wonderful evening after the wolf leaves.
Little Red Riding Hood screams but before she can leave Mr. Wolf eats her right up in one gulp.
"How delicious you are Little Red Riding Hood. " Mr. Wolf responds and gets up to the closet to get the Grandmother. Once he has her in his hands too he eats her as well in one gulp.
